human.proprioception: aware of body position and muscle pain
human.interoception: feeling of muscle soreness and fatigue

need1.suggested robot solution: Retrieve an ice pack from the gym's first aid kit and place it near the person so they can apply it to the sore areas to reduce inflammation and soreness.

need2.suggested robot solution: Provide a foam roller from the gym's equipment for the person to use on their sore muscles, helping to alleviate tightness and improve blood flow.

need3.description: Topical pain relief and muscle recovery
need3.suggested robot solution: Locate and offer a tube of pain relief gel from the gym's first aid area for the person to apply to sore muscles for immediate relief from pain.
